title: $OLD - T206 Sherry Magee Portrait SC 150/30 - SGC 4.5
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: $OLD - T206 Sherry Magee Portrait SC 150/30 - SGC 4.5
posts.post_content: Up for sale is an extremely nice example of a T206 Sherry Magee Portrait SC 150/30.  This card has been graded SGC 4.5 $old net to me (much lower than recent sales but a reasonable price in my opinion, a 5 sold for over $1400 on ebay on 8/7) which includes postage, please message me if interested and thanks for looking.  Cross Posted.  Bob Intrieri.
